title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
Introducing the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses – the ultimate Android TV Smart Glasses that will revolutionize your entertainment experience! With a stunning 360" Micro-OLED Display, these glasses deliver an immersive viewing experience like no other.

Compatible with Android, iOS, and Windows platforms, these glasses offer endless possibilities for entertainment and productivity. Whether you want to stream your favorite shows and movies from popular services like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock, or enjoy a wide range of apps and games from Google Play, the Rokid AR Joy Pack has got you covered.

But that's not all! These glasses also support HDCP, ensuring high-quality content protection, and feature cloud gaming capabilities, allowing you to immerse yourself in the world of gaming like never before. With the Rokid AR Joy Pack, you can enjoy the latest games without the need for a console.

Comfort is a top priority, and that's why these glasses are TüV Rheinland certified for eye comfort. Plus, with a diopter adjustment range of 0.00D to -6.00D, you can easily customize the glasses to suit your vision needs.

Connectivity options are abundant with USB-C, HDMI adapter, and wireless adapter options, providing seamless connectivity to your devices. And with the latest Android TV 12 operating system, you can expect a smooth and intuitive user experience.

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to enhance your entertainment and productivity. Get your hands on the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses today and unlock a world of limitless possibilities. Compatible with Android, iOS, and Windows, these glasses are the perfect companion for all your devices. Order now and elevate your entertainment experience to new heights!
